consult with the doctor or pharmacist about available alternative options that could be more affordable

explore financial assistance programs or charities that may help cover the cost of the medication

seek out assistance from social programs or non-profit organizations that assist people in affording their prescription medication

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. context_1.prompt: One thing that Josh should do is to
generation: call a taxi, an Uber, or a road-side assistance

call for a taxi, Uber, or other similar service, or even ask someone he trusts to drive him to the airport
call a taxi or rideshare service like Uber or Lyft to take him to the airport
call a taxi, an Uber, or any other similar transportation service to ensure he gets to the airport on time
call for a taxi, Uber, or roadside assistance
call a taxi, Uber, or Lyft to get to the airport as quickly as possible
call a taxi, an Uber, or any other rideshare service to get him to the airport as quickly as possible

context_2.vignette: Brian is the evening manager at a bakery. Near the end of the day, he realizes that $50.75 is missing from the register and that he is responsible for accounting for the money at the end of the day. Brian knows he has to make sure the register is balanced or he might lose his job.
context_2.prompt: One thing that Brian should do is to
generation: carefully recount the money in the register to make sure there was no mistake made in his initial count
report the missing money to his superiors

immediately notify his supervisor or the owner about the missing money, explaining how and when he noticed it
carefully review the day's transactions and receipts to see if he can identify any discrepancies or errors that might account for the missing amount
double check the register for any mistakes
review the surveillance tapes if available, or cross-check the sales record with the income recorded in the register to identify any errors or discrepancies
contact his superior or the owner of the bakery to report the missing money
carefully recount the money in the register to ensure his initial count was not in error
contact his supervisor immediately to report the discrepancy

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.

generation: stay where they are and create a noticeable signal for potential rescuers

stay calm and create a plan
create a signal for help
